Q4603. What were X.25 and Frame relay used for 
Predicted answer: Connection oriented operations but x 25 does it at network layer of osi model frame relay does it at level two data link layer another major difference between x 25 and frame relay is that x 25 requires handshake between communicating parties before any user packets are transmitted frame relay does not define any such handshakes x 25 does not define any operations inside packet network it only operates at user network interface uni thus network provider is free to use any procedure it wishes inside network x 25 does specify some limited re transmission procedures at uni and its link layer protocol lapb provides conventional hdlc type link management procedures frame relay is modified version of isdn s layer two protocol lapd and lapb
